item.title: Hugo With Forestry Setup Guide
item.description: The easiest way I have found to setup a static site with a CMS has been to use Forestry.io, Github, & Hugo. This stack is free, easy to use, and efficient. You will new to install hugo for this demo. Step One: Create A Repo and Add Hugo TLDR If you want to skip some of the setup just fork my starter project and jump to step 4. To start, make a new repository on github.
